<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=6118) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud. If your next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) that targets you, you surround yourself in a 15-foot emanation of dense magical mist that lasts until the start of your next turn. All creatures within the cloud become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62), and all creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it.
name: Spell Shroud
